thread.title: Why and how entities are shaping location marketing
thread.title_full: Why and how entities are shaping location marketing

author: Adam Dorfman
title: Why and how entities are shaping location marketing
text:
What are entities, and how are they impacting local search marketing? Columnist Adam Dorfman tackles these questions and provides advice to local businesses looking to capitalize on this trend.

Please visit Marketing Land for the full article.
